Project Manager Job at HR-on-Wheels




        
    

        
        HR-on-Wheels is a Human Resource consulting firm with focus to add value to the businesses of SMEs by emphazing the need to have a people strategy in place.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Project Manager

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Interior Design

Job Summary
     

            
    




	The Project Manager will coordinate and manage all aspects of interior design projects, including budgeting, scheduling, procurement, site supervision, and client communication.
	The ideal candidate must have strong leadership skills, technical expertise, and a flair for aesthetics.


Key Responsibilities


	Plan, execute, and oversee interior design projects from start to finish.
	Develop project timelines, budgets, and resource plans.
	Liaise with clients to understand their vision, requirements, and expectations.
	Coordinate with designers, contractors, vendors, and artisans to ensure quality delivery.
	Monitor on-site activities, ensuring adherence to project specifications and timelines.
	Manage project documentation, reports, and client updates.
	Resolve project issues promptly and professionally.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Architecture, Interior Design, Project Management, or a related field.
	Minimum of 4 years of experience in project management within the interior design, construction, or real estate sectors.
	Proven ability to manage budgets, timelines, and cross-functional teams.
	Excellent communication, leadership, and negotiation skills.
	Strong attention to detail and organizational skills.
	Proficiency in project management tools and design software is an advantage.


Salary
N350,000 (Monthly Net).

Operations & Quality Control Manager Job at TLC Bakery




        
    

        
        The TLC Bakery is a leading bakery in Ibadan famous for our exceptional delivery of exquisite confectionery, ranging from cakes to treats and everything in between. We set out to exceed the expectations of our diverse clientele by taking their needs and desires into consideration. We are here to make your memorable moments delicious, whether it’s a once-in-a-lifetime event or an everyday gathering with friends and family.Our cakes which come in both daring and simple designs, as well as our desserts have graced all manner of occasions. We are committed to upholding our core values of integrity, care and excellence with every order.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Operations & Quality Control Manager
     

            
    



Job Location: Bodija - Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
Operational Leadership & Production Oversight:


	Lead and supervise all daily bakery operations, including production, packaging, shipping, and cleaning.
	Plan, schedule, and coordinate production to meet demand while maintaining quality and efficiency.
	Consolidate product orders and ensure accurate production planning to prevent shortages or waste.
	Identify operational inefficiencies and implement solutions for improved productivity.


Hands-On Confectionery Expertise:


	Maintain deep involvement in baking, decorating, and confectionery production standards.
	Perform quality control checks at every stage of production — before, during, and after.
	Ensure proper handling and maintenance of specialized bakery equipment.
	Set and enforce standards for taste, presentation, and consistency across all products.


Staff Leadership & Training:


	Train and mentor staff on best practices, processes, and quality standards.
	Assign duties, monitor performance, and provide coaching to maintain high productivity.
	Enforce policies, SOPs, and disciplinary measures consistently and fairly.


Quality Assurance & Process Improvement:


	Implement and maintain strict quality control protocols.
	Minimize waste and optimize the use of resources.
	Review and update operational SOPs to reflect best practices and evolving standards.


Reporting & Accountability:


	Maintain production records, quality logs, and operational reports.
	Accountable for maintaining high standards, resolving issues proactively, and ensuring customer satisfaction.


Key Attributes & Competencies:


	Deep technical knowledge of bakery and confectionery production
	Hands-on leadership style – leads by doing, not just delegating
	Years of experience in high-volume bakery operations
	Strong attention to detail and quality
	Ability to train and hold staff accountable
	Problem-solver and decision-maker under pressure.


Salary
N200,000 - N250,000 per month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: [email protected] using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
